article_title: Former longtime Portsmouth legislator Johnny Joannou dies at 76
article_text:

og.description: Former Del. Johnny S. Joannou, D-Portsmouth, a lawyer who served in the General Assembly for 34 years and lost his seat in a June 2015 Democratic primary, died Friday at 76.
